website_summaries.verdict: An adorable, hand-knit sweater that will keep your dog warm without overheating.
pros: Hand-knit sweater keeps pooch warm while remaining breathable
Organic wool is soft, not scratchy
All yarn is naturally dyed with plants and fruits
Sizing chart and printable measuring tape are available for use before purchase
cons: There is no way to attach a leash to this sweater

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find this cheaper on amazon compared to the website I used to work at chewy.com (stay away from them, horrible company to work for) and fell in love with these dog sweaters They are amazing quality and I know my fluffy little rat will be warm when she goes outside. Also the hood and pattern are so adorable. I got my first one about a year ago and my dog wears it every day during the winter months, its held up and I haven't had to wash it yet (my dog has hair not fur). Wash in cold water and air dry if needed! Wool is so fussy
customer_reviews.author: Haile

customer_reviews.title: Simply the cutest sweater EVER
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks just RIDICULOUS-CUTE in this sweater and the XXL fits my labrador retriever (who is a bit on the small side for a lab) perfectly. It is very warm wool, feels very well-made, and I love that it has a bit of a belly covering to it as well (though not enough to get in the way if you have a male dog). Every time I put it on her we get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rutheiser

customer_reviews.title: Way too long
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is thick , but kinda rough. My dog weighs 77 pounds and has an large chest. Finally something that fits her girth. BUT is is about 5 inches too long. and she soils it if I let her wear it outside. Instead of returning I have folded under, ironed flat and sewed it. Not sure how long that will last. And I truly can't image the length fitting anything other than a Basset Hound, Corgi or Dachshund.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Williams

customer_reviews.title: XXL fits  80Lb
customer_reviews.text: The XXL fits my 80lb dog. He's 44" long with 34" chest and 21" neck. It was a little snug in the neck but I can fit my fingers neck area fine. Sweater material is heavy enough to keep him warm when he sticks his head out the window during car rides..
customer_reviews.author: j.gault

customer_reviews.title: just like the "chilly dog bunny hoodie"
customer_reviews.text: very cute sweater, especially the ears. just like the "chilly dog bunny hoodie", this one seems to fit as intended and seems to be pretty warm. Our boxer mix gets pretty warm after wearing it in the house for a little while. I'm not sure if it's just our broad chested, knucklehead or if it's a flaw, but the neck of the sweater has stretched out and started to unravel a bit in the front. It's gotten to the point that it's un-wearable for her as it's just too loose and she ends up wearing it like a skirt!
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: Not a soft sweater. Prickly and waxy.
customer_reviews.text: The design is so cute so I'm really disappointed that this sweater didn't work out. First thing I noticed when I opened the package was that, instead of being soft, there was this weird greasy feeling on the wool (like it had been coated with wax). I was willing to look past this, but then I kept getting pricked as I touched the sweater. I took a closer look and noticed twigs stuck in the thread. I removed 6 of them before giving up because they are everywhere! Will be returning. I can't imagine how itchy a dog would be wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: yee seul chun

customer_reviews.title: This sweater taught my dog a valuable lesson...
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates it, but my wife loves it. Poor dog. He now wears it anytime the wife is cold. He's learned that whatever the woman of the house wants, she gets no matter how much we men may disagree. Poor dog. P.S. its not that he hates this sweater, he just hates all clothing. You know, because he's a dog. And dogs aren't meant to wear clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Woodnv

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really adorable. Got the xxs for my 1.6lb teacup poodle puppy. Sadly there is no stretch and it's quite a struggle to get it on and I worry that the neck area has no give against her neck, so I'm constantly making sure it's not pulling tight across her throat. Not sure if the next size would be any better. Really wish the neck had an elastic edging. So not in love for this reason. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Scott Silbert

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've purchased for three different dogs. - Adorable - Warm - Wool - Doesn't slip off easily, like all other sweaters I have - Fit guide seems to help find a perfect fit. - Good fit for longer dogs
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Great sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: I have at least 6 chilly dog sweaters & I’ve never been disappointed. The quality is excellent & I get so many compliments on how handsome my boy looks.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Love the Monkey!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! Arrived early in perfect condition. I get my puppy tomorrow. Hope it fits him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Varies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small for my 16 pound dog and it fits well with room to go. I purchased an xsmall for my eight pound toy poodle and it is too small -- very tight around the neck and not long enough. The xsmall seems like an xxsmall and the small seems like a medium. Being handmade, the fit may not be consistent. Otherwise, really cute and appears to be a warm coat. I will need to return the xsmall.
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: Best doggie sweaters
customer_reviews.text: I bought Chilly Dog sweaters for my first basset, and now enjoying the new styles with my new basset rescue. My basset hound and I get stopped almost daily (no kidding) for photo and tickle requests, everyone loves the sock monkey sweater. I am glad that I read the reviews on sizing. My guy is 63 lbs, and I am glad I downsized to the Xl versus the XXl. I will say there was a dropped stitch in the neck, I almost returned but it was on sale and super cold in my area so I decided to fix myself. Would still buy from them again for the great styles and quality, this was my 4th Chilly Dog sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Luwen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I received this sweater today and it is well made and just adorable! As for sizing, I ordered an extra small and it fits my 4.1 lb puppy really well. He's very fluffy so it might be too big on a short haired dog the same size. This sweater is big enough to give him some room to grow, which is good since he is still a pup, but not too loose at all. I highly recommend this sweater!
customer_reviews.author: jessica7531

customer_reviews.title: Smells!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sweater, comfy cozy but the odor was terrible, I returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: All the Chilly Dog sweaters are great quality! Just got this monkey sweater. Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Paws

customer_reviews.title: Looks Greats ... Does Not last.. minimal quality.. save your $$
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my 12 yr old 70 lb American Staffie after seeing a sample pic on a social media site. it was sized perfectly; but after nearly 30 days of use the head opening and other sections began to fray and unravel. problem with this item is the lack of tightness of the weave. it will give after repeated use and begins to fall part. decent for occasional use otherwise ...dont bother
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Therefore it is useless to us
customer_reviews.text: Cute but cannot walk my tiny dog with this sweater! There is no "space" through which to fasten a leash ... without that, the hood does not stay on his little head and ears. Therefore it is useless to us.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou Who?

customer_reviews.title: Warm Cute Pit Bull Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 60 lb pit bull very well and is hilarious. Natural wool so may need an undershirt for short coats. Plenty of room across the chest. My dog usually looks intimidating - not so when wearing this sweater. Amazing prime shipping. I think we got it in one day. Keeps him plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Pure wool; completely adorable. May not be comfy on short haired pup. Great for warmth, not for water protection. Would be an outstanding gift for a pet lover. Will be buying more next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I'm very happy with my purchase. The Chilly Dog sweaters are unique, charming, well made and all natural. They are perfect to keep warm any doggy in cold weather. Plus there are large enough sizes to fit big dogs!! Without a doubt, I would recommend it. And its message "Please spay and neuter your pets. Don't shop. Adopt". It's simply the coolest!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryelin

customer_reviews.title: XL SWEATER
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is adorable and seems very heavy and warm. My coon hound/ beaglemix is 45lbs, Lengthy 24", Neck 18" and Chest 27". The length was perfect but it was too tight in the chest and neck by about 2".
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Patton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable! My pit mix will not wear the hoodie ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! My pit mix will not wear the hoodie but it is still very cute. I bought two sweaters from this company, both an XL, but this one seems to fit better. Very, very nice quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Carthom36

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. They sent the wrong size the first time but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: tina lake

customer_reviews.title: I love the Chilly Dog line of sweaters
customer_reviews.text: I love the Chilly Dog line of sweaters...they are warm, all natural, adorable, and make large enough sizes to fit BIG dogs!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: My 6 lb Pomeranian puppy wears a XS and it fits perfect with some room to grow
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is so cute. My 6 lb Pomeranian puppy wears a XS and it fits perfect with some room to grow. I was reading other reviews and some people were saying that the sweater had a funny smell. It is just the smell of the wool. These sweaters are organic wool and they don't use harsh chemicals. Most people who have clothing or scarves that are 100% wool know that wool smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J.

customer_reviews.title: My 65lb pit bull with a broad body would easily ( with a bit of room) fit in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the pictures show. My 65lb pit bull with a broad body would easily ( with a bit of room) fit in a L.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest sweater ever!! I love sock monkeys and now my little Yorkie can be one too! LOL! Very well made!!
customer_reviews.author: jhh

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soothing1
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this really cute, but it is heavy. For whatever reason my dog really calms down when its on her. Weird hidden benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable but the yarn makes it a little too stiff and heavy for a 2 lb dog. Pico couldn't turn his head with the hood up.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: can't go wrong with chilly dog..except sometimes their sizes are not accurate
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sweater and my dog loves the sweater! It is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Chronicles

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and
customer_reviews.text: Sons girlfriends dog loves her new sweater. Nicely made and warm
customer_reviews.author: D. Clayman

customer_reviews.title: Fits just like it
customer_reviews.text: Item is cute as all get up!! Fits just like it states
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Dog Sweater
customer_reviews.text: This item is a little snug just around the neck, but will be OK. I had ordered the size larger, but the hood fit too loosely.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reed

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: This Sweater runs very small. I have a 45 pound mixed Pitt Bull Terrier and it did not fit him. The sizing is much smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. James

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I have A golden retriver 10month old. he is almost 44-50 lb. now. I had same one XL before when my dog is 6-7 months. He loved it but now he is still growing up.. Finally I ordered XXL again. Great quality, great design(cute hoodie with ears) Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable! Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable! Easy on and off! Very warm for our dog who does not have a double coat and living in Iowa winter- wear on our long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget J. Wingad

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and my german shepherd/husky mix looks great in it! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Seth C.

customer_reviews.title: My cute little monkey!
customer_reviews.text: Actually fits my pit! He is an XL, 20 inch length, chest girth 29, 51 pounds. Sweater is cut so his boy parts are free to pee. It doesn't seem to bother him but the wool is the scratchy kind. He looks adorable in it.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Sweater
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets SO cold in the winter! This sweater was the perfect purchase! She is cute in it. She gets a ton of compliments. She is warm and cozy and enjoys being outdoors... My only two complains? Sizing: XXS 2-5lbs XS 5-10lbs S 10-18lbs M 18-28 L 28-40 XL 40-60 XXL 60-80 XXXL 80-120 The XL was TOO big for my 50lb dog. I should have ordered a size down. .... Also, the hood doesn't stay up.... I had to sew in some elastic. But in the end - It is still awesome quality and I will surely buy from again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Onalaska Farm Sanctuary

product_meta.title: Chilly Dog Hoodie Dog Sweater
product_meta.description: Size:X-Small| Color:MonkeyChilly Dog sweaters are made following the fair trade guidelines. All sweaters are handmade and may vary slightly in color and style.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
